content.question: Which of the following best describes the federal governmentâ€™s response to the overall patterns depicted in the graph?

choices.label: The construction of highways meant to facilitate the transportation of fuel
The passage of laws meant to combat environmental problems caused by power generation
The enactment of policies meant to eliminate certain sources of power
The commitment of resources to the expansion of nuclear energy production

content.answer: The passage of laws meant to combat environmental problems caused by power generation

topic.text: 8.13: The Environment and Natural Resources from 1968 to 1980

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
